Class VoronoiValleys2D

This generator creates a "valleys" Voronoi diargam, that returns difference between two closest distances. Resulting settings has highest value at control points and 0 away from control points.

VoronoiValleys2D(Int32)

Create new Voronoi diagram using seed. Control points will be obtained using random displacment seeded by supplied value

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetResult(Single, Single, Single)

Override this method to calculate final value using distances to closest control points. Note that distances that get passed to this function are adjusted for frequency (i.e. distances are scaled so that control points are in unit sized cubes)

Declaration

Distance to closest point

Distance to second-closest point
